thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: More Than 200 China-Listed Stocks to Join MSCI’s Indexes

author: Joanne Chiu
title: More Than 200 China-Listed Stocks to Join MSCI’s Indexes
text:
Global index provider MSCI Inc. has released a list of more than 200 Chinese stocks that it will include in its key indexes from next month, capping a year-long process that is likely to attract billions of dollars into China’s markets.
Last year, MSCI decided to include China-listed stocks in its global benchmarks after three years of rejections. Of the more than 3,000 companies listed in China, just 234 will be included in MSCI’s indexes on June 1, largely in line with market expectations. The initial batch of companies...
